Package serverSide.sharedRegions

Package that contains the shared regions.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ContestantBench
    ContestantBench shared memory region.
    ContestantBenchInterface
    Interface to the Contestant Bench It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the Contestant Bench e and generate the outgoing message.
    GeneralRepository
    General Repository It is responsible for logging the internal state of the problem in a file.
    GeneralRepositoryInterface
    Interface to the General Repository It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the General Repository and generate the outgoing message.
    Playground
    Playground Shared Memory Region where the game takes place
    PlaygroundInterface
    Interface to the Playground It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the Playground e and generate the outgoing message.
    RefereeSite
    Referee Site Shared Memory Region
    RefereeSiteInterface
    Interface to the Referee Site It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the Referee Site and generate the outgoing message.

Package serverSide.sharedRegions Description
